name: Beer Me !
description:
Do you ready for your new job ?

Make a good beer with a just ratio of beer and foam !

Serve your customers in the times for gain reputation !
__________________________________________________
Commands :
- Left click for chose a beer style (after customers say which he want)

- Left click for fill the beer (Use the mouse  Up and Down for ajust the angle and make a beer with good ratio between beer and foam (more foam, worse it is, but it takes a little)

- "Space" key for validate your beer

- "F" key for trash your beer if he didn't good

- Hold the left click for charge the launch and realese for launch
___________________________________________________
The game have a tutorial mode and a challenge mode
Ready ?

! You can be desactive the post processing on the main menu !
